name: Saucey Inc.
description: Provider of an on-demand alcohol delivery platform designed to offer a reliable way to shop for alcohol. The company's alcohol delivery platform offers the convenience of 30-minutes delivery, enabling consumers to purchase alcohol with higher frequency.
one_liner: Provider of an on-demand alcohol delivery platform designed to offer a reliable way to shop for alcohol. The company's alcohol delivery platform offers the convenience of 30-minutes delivery, enabling consumers to purchase alcohol with higher frequency.
